As an AI language model, I don't have access to current information but I can suggest some tour companies in Vlorë that may offer walking tours of the city. 

One such tour company is Vlorë Tours, which offers a variety of walking tours around the city, including architectural tours that showcase Vlorë's Ottoman, Italian, and modernist buildings. Another company is Visit Vlorë, which also offers walking tours of the city that highlight its historical and architectural features.

It's always a good idea to do your own research and read reviews of tour companies before booking, to ensure that they offer the type of tour that you're interested in and that they have a good reputation.
